name: Stonks Odyssey - Team 13
description:
You're playing as a trader from Wall Street. Your goal : make a shitload of money !


In this game you will have a control panel allowing you to buy or sell stocks. Your role is to speculate up or down the values of these stocks to enrich yourself as much as possible.

Make the right decisions, use your money wisely and most importantly ... don't give in to distractions !

You have the option of selling all of your shares, or you can buy everything at once. But beware .. Everything can fall apart in no time .


An immersive and colorful experience: 

Step into the shoes of a real trader thirsty for risk and money ! Dive into a vapor wave universe and let yourself go to music and adrenaline. 

Risk is your only friend here : 

Follow the movements of the curve and let the crazy bettor in you speak. 

Time is limited, do your best! 

You will have 60 seconds to achieve the highest score


Game Design :
Timothé COURTIER, Romain DE LEUZE, Silouane PARENT

Programming : 
Dov BENZAQUEN, Félix JOUANNEAU, Loïck GOMBAULD

Art :
Abdelbari BERRIM

Music/Composer :
Silouane PARENT, Loïck GOMBAULD

Producing :Eliott TIRANT, Sofiane BOUHEZILA

Voice Off :
Maha KAMAL

Developed in 4 days by 9 students from the "Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia", Stonks Odyssey was designed and imagined for the JAM Godfather / Godmother (2021).

Our theme is based on "How you fall doesn't matter it's how you land" from the movie "La Haine".
